sentences.en: As in reconnaissance work, aerial photographic volume estimates can be satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 作为森林资源概查工作来说, 航空象片的蓄积量估计值能满足要求.

sentences.en: Convictions will rise steeply now photographic evidence is admissible.
sentences.cn: 既然照片证据可以接受，有罪判决将大幅增加。

sentences.en: Ensure all photographic material is properly packed and sent by recorded delivery.
sentences.cn: 确保把所有的摄影资料包装妥当并挂号寄出.

sentences.en: French artist and inventor of the daguerreotype process for obtaining positive photographic prints.
sentences.cn: 达盖尔,路易斯·雅克·曼德1789-1851法国艺术家和发明家,发明了银版摄影术,能洗出照片的正画来.

sentences.en: He had a photographic memory for maps.
His photographic memory enabled him to tuck away yards of facts.
sentences.cn: 他过目不忘的记忆力使他能记下大量事实.

sentences.en: I found the cheapest price for enlarging the photograph by ringing round all the photographic dealers.
sentences.cn: 我给所有的照相馆都打了电话,找到了放大照片要价最低的地方.

sentences.en: Ions of different isotopes converge at different points on the photographic plate.
sentences.cn: 在照相底板上不同的同位素的离子会聚于不同点.

sentences.en: Of special interest is the photographic determination of altitudes of lunar formation.
sentences.cn: 最有趣的是用照相来测定月面结构物的高度.

sentences.en: Parks has a tendency to become personally involved with his photographic subjects.
sentences.cn: 帕克斯往往会跟他的拍摄对象产生感情纠葛。

sentences.en: The bank is able to provide photographic evidence of who used the machine.
sentences.cn: 银行能提供用过该机器的顾客的影像证据。

sentences.en: The joint use of professional photographic laboratories rarely works out well.
sentences.cn: 和职业照相室合用一间暗房是做不出什么好成绩来的.

sentences.en: The photographic elements contain a blue - sensitive hydrophilic colloid silver halide emulsion layer.
sentences.cn: 照像材料含有亲水胶体的感蓝卤化银卤剂层.

sentences.en: The software allows you to scan photographic images on your personal computer.
sentences.cn: 这个软件让你可以在个人电脑上浏览拍摄的图像。

sentences.en: The wrong chemical balance can cause severe distortion of the photographic image.
sentences.cn: 化学药水不合比例可引致摄影图像的严重失真.

sentences.en: They produced a photographic record of the event.
sentences.cn: 他们把这一事件制作了一套照片实录。

words.tran_cn: 上照的；适于摄影的；由光导致的
摄影报道，摄影新闻工作
摄影的；逼真的；（尤指记忆）详细准确的

phrases.tran_cn: 照相器材；摄影设备；照相设备
过目不忘的能力；照相存储器
照相底片；摄影底片；照相底板

trans.tran_cn: 摄影（术）的，摄影用的，逼真的，（尤指记忆）记得详细准确的
trans.tran_en: relating to photographs, using photographs, or used in producing photographs
